mlflex
Class SquaredWeightedVoteEnsemblePredictor

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.AbstractEnsemblePredictor
      mlflex.AbstractWeightedVoteCombiner
          mlflex.SquaredWeightedVoteEnsemblePredictor

public class SquaredWeightedVoteEnsemblePredictor
extends AbstractWeightedVoteCombiner

This weight-based ensemble-learning approaches uses the "squared weight" assigned to each individual prediction. The squared weights are assigned based on AUC values attained within inner cross-validation folds. The AUC values are squared in an attempt to put even higher emphasis on individual predictions that are expected to perform well based on the performance within the inner cross-validation folds.

Author:
Stephen Piccolo
